content.rendered:
Register for events related to the #RoadToCTA #SalesforceSaturday Group here, as well as the Chatter and Eventbrite Group.

Register on Eventbrite

Join the RoadToCTA Chatter Group

Follow the Eventbrite Page

  • Calendar
  • Events
  • About RoadToCTA SalesforceSaturday
Meighan Brodkey
May 4, 2020

Calendar

Meighan Brodkey
January 17, 2018

Presentations

excerpt.rendered: Register for the upcoming RoadToCTA Salesforce Saturday Events

jetpack-related-posts.title: Calendar
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Calendar of Salesforce Community events, System Dot Debug Podcast, Meighan's Presentation's and other Salesforce related events

jetpack-related-posts.title: Automation Hour 2021: Einstein Bot Flows &  Omni-Channel Routing
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Curious about Einstein Bots, Flow, or the new Omni-Channel Routing functionality? In this episode of Automation Hour, you'll learn about AI and all of that inside of Salesforce from Technical Architect & Salesforce MVP, Meighan Brodkey.

img.alt_text: Automation Hour: Flows, Bots, and AI… OH MY!!!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dallas Developer Group Road to CTA: July 2020
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: July 22 as we gathered (virtually) to discuss News in the Salesforce world with our peers.Thrilled to join Dallas Developer User Group to share will share with us the How and Why I has undertaken the journey to CTA as well as advising others who are interested in pursuing. Learn…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Panaya: Best Practices for Maintaining Healthy Salesforce Architecture
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: May 5 webinar with Guillermo Pedroni and myself tried and true best practices for maintaining healthy Salesforce Architecture. With tips on planning security, keeping your design simple – from the start, data cleanup & mapping and more.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Welly User Group: Community Cloud Expert
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Join me to talk Community Cloud security from scratch or audit your existing. We’ll review how to setup sharing sets, account relationships, channel programs, Apex sharing, profiles, and licenses. Better how the types of sharing work together, how to decide when to use each, and best practices for implementing a…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Calendly
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Schedule an appointment to chat with me.
